message: I'm offering you a high-quality product worth $3000000. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a top-of-the-line item at a fixed price of $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you for this price, which is a 33.3% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll have to offer it to someone else, and you might miss out on a valuable opportunity.
I'd like to pass on this opportunity. I'm not convinced that the product is actually high-quality, and I'd rather wait for more information before making a decision.
